name: Down the Dwarven Hole
description:
Fully voice acted and made in 48 hours for 48th Ludum Dare event. There are instructions in the game if you press the "I" key but for those who would rather read them here I will post them here.

WASD is you characters movement

The game only has 4 items: Swords, Shields, Keys, and Potions

Swords let you kill enemies, Shields stop you from taking damage from bumping into an enemy, Keys open doors, and potions heal you. 

You can only carry one of any given item (except keys) at a time so be sure not to pick up two.
